-Where are the actual prayers themselfs. not the skill. i need the smite code -Where are the player vs player combat codes, trying to make ppl hit higher

item.title: [PI] a few questions
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“Atreyu1993, post:7, topic:429423”]Just declare a Boolean constant in your Config class and just add an if statement in the method for attacking npcs, and have it return if true.

Declare this

public static final boolean ALLOWPVM = false;

And in the method for attacking npc’s just do something like

if(Config.ALLOWPVM == false) {//True if you want to be able to attack npc's c.sendMessage("Pvm is disabled!"); return; }[/quote]

if(!Config.ALLOW_PVM) {//True if you want to be able to attack npc's c.sendMessage("Pvm is disabled!"); return; }
Don’t need the == false, also make it ALLOW_PVM.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

Just declare a Boolean constant in your Config class and just add an if statement in the method for attacking npcs, and have it return if true.

Declare this

public static final boolean ALLOWPVM = false;

And in the method for attacking npc’s just do something like

if(Config.ALLOWPVM == false) {//True if you want to be able to attack npc's c.sendMessage("Pvm is disabled!"); return; }

item.title: [PI] a few questions
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

Combat is handles in the combatAssistant class and if your talking about prayer’s activating look at the clickingbuttons packet.

If your looking how smite is handled i believe that it’s the applySmite method in your combatAssistant class too.

Also i believe the methods for combat are like calculateMeleeMaxHit and calculateMeleeAttack, look around there, im not really sure.

Read full topic

Prayers are located mainly in Player class, and Player VS Player is in CombatAssistant.
